code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{withRouter}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{getUnseenMessages}from'../redux/actions/messageActions';import{useLoggedInUser}from'../helper/hooks/auth.hooks';function ScrollToTop(_ref){var history=_ref.history;var dispatch=useDispatch();var loggedInUser=useLoggedInUser();useEffect(function(){if(loggedInUser){var unlisten=history.listen(function(){window.scrollTo(0,0);});dispatch(getUnseenMessages(loggedInUser._id));return function(){unlisten();};}},[]);return null;}export default withRouter(ScrollToTop);
